Posts.EditableText: Well this is very embarrassing,I'm trying to remember where I got code for a UI element that seems to be troublesome, I can't remember where I picked it up but the effect was when you had a opened container the contents were slightly indented, the error was only brought up to me recently and i know i installed it many months ago, since not in the start script or an apparent function i'm thinking It might be in the library somewhere the result looks like this The problem with the code is some strange effects on the verb options frequently closing on their own as the mouse is moved around. So as a semi logical programmer i figured if i tried to remove it it might help me in diagnosing the problem Anyone recognize this?
Posts.HTML:
Well this is very embarrassing,I'm trying to remember where I got code for a UI element that seems to be troublesome, I can't remember where I picked it up but the effect was when you had a opened container the contents were slightly indented, the error was only brought up to me recently and i know i installed it many months ago, since not in the start script or an apparent function i'm thinking It might be in the library somewhere

the result looks like this

The problem with the code is some strange effects on the verb options frequently closing on their own as the mouse is moved around. So as a semi logical programmer i figured if i tried to remove it it might help me in diagnosing the problem
Anyone recognize this?

Posts.EditableText:
Wasn't directly, but through that found out it was the PrettyInventoryLib
going to try to remove it now
